features.name: NFL Combine Measurables System
features.description: Full athletic testing data for all prospects with position-specific ranges and elite thresholds
requirements: 11 physical measurements: height, weight, arm length, hand size, wingspan, plus existing 40-time
5 additional athletic tests: vertical jump, broad jump, 3-cone, 20-yard shuttle, bench press
Position-specific elite thresholds (e.g., <4.40s 40 for WR, 36"+ vertical for CB)
Archetype modifiers for ranges (speed WR vs possession WR)
Combine results influence draft stock (risers/fallers)

features.name: Expanded College Database
features.description: 130+ colleges with metadata enabling realistic prospect distribution and school-specific storylines
requirements: 5 tiers: Blue Blood (8), Elite (16), Power 5 (40), Group of 5 (30), FCS (36+)
Each college: id, name, mascot, conference, colors, strengthPositions
Tier-weighted selection (Blue Blood 15-20%, FCS 5-10% of draft)
Regional mapping for area scout bonuses
School-specific draft history generation

features.name: College Career Stats & Accolades
features.description: Position-specific college statistics and awards for each prospect
requirements: Position-specific stats: QB (comp%, yards, TDs), RB (carries, YPC), WR (rec, YPR), etc.
3-4 year career totals with per-season breakdowns
Major accolades: Heisman, All-American (1st/2nd/3rd), Conference POY
Position awards: Biletnikoff, Doak Walker, Outland, Butkus, etc.
Bowl game appearances and MVPs
Stats correlate with OVR but not perfectly (evaluation uncertainty)

features.name: Pre-Draft Interview System
features.description: Interactive interview sessions revealing character and mental traits
requirements: Costs 40 scouting points per interview (from types.ts)
5 question categories: Football Knowledge, Character, Work Ethic, Medical, Personal
Reveals: Character traits, Football IQ, Work ethic indicators, Injury history, Leadership
Scout quality affects reveal accuracy
Limited interviews per team (simulating NFL 60-player limit)

features.name: Combine Week Simulation
features.description: Week 19 event where combine results are revealed and stock changes
requirements: Day-by-day schedule by position group
All measurables revealed (free during combine period per types.ts)
Risers: Prospects who exceeded expectations (+5-15 draft spots)
Fallers: Prospects who disappointed (-5-15 draft spots)
Storylines: Workout warriors, medical red flags, interview impressors
Mock draft updates based on combine performance

features.name: Pro Day Events
features.description: Week 20 school workouts and private visits with enhanced accuracy
requirements: School visits: Attend any pro day for free (per types.ts PERIOD_MODIFIERS)
Private workouts: Request specific prospects (60 points, highest accuracy)
Enhanced measurable accuracy vs combine
Final board adjustments before draft
Limited private workout slots (10-15 per team)

features.name: Draft Day Experience
features.description: Full draft room interface with real-time picks, trades, and board management
requirements: Pick ticker showing current pick, team, countdown timer
Draft board with user's ranked prospects (drag-and-drop)
Team needs panel with position grades and depth
Selection panel: Best available, position filter, make pick button
Trade interface: Trade up/down with value chart comparison
7 rounds, 224 picks + compensatory picks
Speed settings: Real-time, Fast, Instant per round
Mobile-first: Bottom sheets, swipeable cards, FAB for picks

features.name: Trade Mechanics
features.description: Trade up/down system with AI negotiation and value chart
requirements: NFL-style trade value chart (1st overall = 3000 pts)
Future picks worth ~80% of current year
AI counter-offers based on team situation (rebuild vs contend)
Package players with picks
Trade deadline during draft
Trade history tracking

features.name: Rookie Camp Integration
features.description: Post-draft evaluation revealing true ratings and assigning development
requirements: Week 22 event after draft
Initial OVR reveal: ±3 from true OVR (Year 1 accuracy)
Camp standouts and disappointments
Development plan assignment
Mentor pairing with veterans
Position battle setup
True OVR fully revealed after Year 2
